Improvements.Description: There is a lot of repeated code in this method. The creation of the `smartInterceptorDef` and the registration of it occurs in every condition. This can be moved into its own method to reduce code duplication and increase readability.

Improvements.Improvement: Replace multiple if-else conditions with switch-case
Improvements.Description: Instead of using multiple if-else conditions to check the `LocalName` of the `childElement`, a switch-case block can be used. This will make the code more readable and maintainable.
